title: Diamond in the Dust
description: Life is the dirt where I’ve buried the secrets of my past.With a few careless words, those rotting memories have been uncovered.For years, I healed the past by living in the moment.Until I found the woman who would be my future.Now all those unspoken secrets have the power to destroy everything.What started out as a simple rescue has taken me down a road I never could’ve imagined. And I’ll do anything to keep her in my life.The ugliness of my past is buried deep.But no matter how much dirt you throw on top of them, skeletons always have a way of crawling out of the darkest holes.
author: Autumn Jones Lake
